name: Pokémon Myth
storyline:
"A trainer who truly tries their hardest will always succeed in the end, despite the amount of evil they face…”

Pokemon Myth is all about proving your worth, with many new faces that believe in you throughout your journey, you must strive to become the new Pokemon Champion and prove to everyone that you are more than just a 15-year-old kid from Courmine Village. Throughout your journey, you gain the trust of many strong trainers, who see potential in you and ask for your help against Team Corrupt. Team Corrupt is an evil organization commanded by an anonymous face, and their goal is to create a newfound power by using Arceus and Mew, the two gods of the Mythan Region! Follow this team to the depths of Mythic Forest, Lost Temple, to finally put a stop to once and for all, prove that you can beat all 8 gyms along the way, and take over the Pokemon League, to show that you can succeed!
summary: Embark on an epic adventure in Pokémon Myth, where you'll rise from a 15-year-old villager to a legendary Champion. Unravel the sinister plot of Team Corrupt, an enigmatic organization seeking to harness the power of Arceus and Mew, the region's legendary Pokémon. Discover the groundbreaking "Infusion Types," a new mechanic that empowers your Pokémon with type-specific DNA, boosting their attacks and adding a strategic layer to battles. Encounter intriguing factions like the research-driven Team Rose/Infusion Inc. and the formidable Team Astra, hailing from the Serene region. Explore two vast regions, plus Sinnoh and Unova, teeming with new Mega Evolutions, regional forms, and a plethora of Fakemon, including unique Star-Face shiny variants. With player-controlled gyms, custom mechanics, new moves, items, types, and even new Eeveelutions, Pokémon Myth offers a fresh and captivating Pokémon experience.
